SEARCH
Package ar.edu.utn.frc.tup.lc.iv.services.imp

Class AccessesService

java.lang.Object
ar.edu.utn.frc.tup.lc.iv.services.imp.AccessesService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAccessesService
@Service public class AccessesService extends Object implements IAccessesService
Service implementation for handling operations related to authorized access entities. This service interacts with the repository to manage and retrieve access records.

    • getAccessGrouped

      public List<DashboardDTO> getAccessGrouped(LocalDateTime from, LocalDateTime to, VisitorType visitorType, ActionTypes actionType, GroupByPeriod group, DataType dataType)
      Specified by:
      getAccessGrouped in interface IAccessesService
      Parameters:
      from - the start date/time (inclusive) of the range.
      to - the end date/time (inclusive) of the range.
      visitorType - the type of visitor for filtering (optional).
      actionType - the type of action for filtering (optional).
      group - the period to group the results by (DAY, WEEK, MONTH, YEAR).
      dataType - the type of data to retrieve (ALL or INCONSISTENCIES).
      Returns:
      DashboardDTO access counts grouped by the specified period.

    • getInconsistentAccessCount

      public Long getInconsistentAccessCount(LocalDateTime from, LocalDateTime to, VisitorType visitorType)
      Retrieves the count of inconsistent access events within the specified date range and filtered by visitor type.
      Specified by:
      getInconsistentAccessCount in interface IAccessesService
      Parameters:
      from - the start date and time (inclusive) of the range
      to - the end date and time (inclusive) of the range
      visitorType - the type of visitor to filter by
      Returns:
      the count of inconsistent access events that match the given criteria
